config.neo4j.topic.cypher.mirea.public.groups: WITH event WHERE event.op = 'c' MERGE (g:Group {id: event.after.id}) ON CREATE SET g.title = event.after.title, g.course = event.after.course, g.spec_id = event.after.spec_id ON MATCH SET g.title = event.after.title, g.course = event.after.course, g.spec_id = event.after.spec_id WITH g, event MATCH (s:Spec {id: g.spec_id}) MERGE (s)-[:HAS_GROUP]->(g)
